Title: That Obscure Object of Desire
Writer: Luis Buñuel (scenario), Jean-Claude Carrière (collaboration), Pierre Louÿs (inspired by the book "La femme et le pantin")
Actors: Fernando Rey, Carole Bouquet, Ángela Molina, Julien Bertheau
Plot: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen year-old former chambermaid Conchita.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.
